rule: The output must classify the input text into one of the four predefined categories: World, Sports, Business, or Sci/Tech.
input: New trade agreement signed between US and EU
validityText:
The input provided is a string that generally represents a news article. It pertains to a world event, specifically a trade agreement signed between the United States and the European Union. This subject fits under the category of "World" as indicated by the input specification. Thus, the input complies with the requirement that it should fit into one of the specified categories: World. 

OK
